attributes.action: introduce legislation to ensure that unelected persons should never serve as secretaries of state, nor government ministers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our present government seems intent on increasing the numbers of nondemocratically elected persons serving as government ministers and tsars.  This is counter to most peoples idea of democracy and should cease forthwith.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
